reply: Thank you for providing the load information for load ID 903113. The status shows that it is currently stuck at the shipper. We will monitor the situation closely and provide updates as necessary. If you require any further assistance or information, please feel free to let us know.
Thank you for the update on load 789332. It is currently in "Awaiting POD" status. If you need any assistance or further information, feel free to reach out.

Thank you for the update on load ID 546789. It appears that the delivery is delayed with a new estimated time of arrival at 3:45 PM outside Houston. Please let us know if there are any further developments or support needed.
